channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟠 02:26 The threat of shock Bplasagrasis of UAV type "Shahaned"
item.description: 🟠 02:26 The threat of shock Bplasagrasis of UAV type "Shahaned"#m_harkiv_that_harkivska_The territorial This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
